website_summaries.verdict: A great basic infusion water bottle for a fantastic price.
cons: The lid screws on and off and the bottle doesn't include a spout or straw, so it's hard to drink from this on the go

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Bottle and Excellent Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle. I have ordered it 3 times! The infuser reaches almost the bottom of the bottle and infuses the water even with a little bit of water. I also like the markings on the side to keep me on track to drink water! In addition, I contacted the seller to replace my leaking bottle. Once I figured out how to communicate through Amazon Message Center, coordination of a replacement was easy. I am very impressed with Sean P. and his dedication to top notch customer service. If everyone did business like Sean the world would be a better place.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Makes drinking water fun and delicious -
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this water bottle. I bought 2 of these bottles so I can rotate them and always have a bottle infusing and ready to drink in the fridge. I absolutely hate drinking water. These bottles have helped me get my water intake daily and have fun while doing it. The green bottle is bright and looks great, just wish it came in different colors so each family member could identify their bottle(s).
customer_reviews.author: Lil Z's Mom

customer_reviews.title: La Organics Fruit Infuser
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought LA Organics Fruit Infuser. I haven't used a fruit infuser before and was shopping around and glad I purchased this item. I love that it can also be used as a water bottle as well if you aren't in the mood for the infuser. I like the markings on the side that keep you on track for your water intake for the day. It helps motivate me to drink more. I like that it also doesn't spill. You can turn it upside down and no water leakage. It's reasonably priced. I am glad I went with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Healthier than Soda!
customer_reviews.text: My brother and his wife are going to love this product. I may have to even get one for myself when I start teaching again this September. I really like that the plastic is safe, and the motivational messages on the side crack me up, although he may not notice. Get that water in, anyway you can! Oh, and the shipping on this product was fantastic. I had the product within a two days or so.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda DelMonaco

customer_reviews.title: Great Infusor Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this water infuser bottle because you drink out of it as you would out of glass not like a thermos with a plastic spout. It's very well made; the water pours down straight into the fruit infuser as well as around it; you can shake it without worry so as to speed up the infusion process because the lid when closed is completely sealed, aesthetically speaking it looks refreshing as the fruit infused water it creates. It's a great deal for the price, I'd recommend it to anyone wanting to drink healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Mersea

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but bottle needs a little tweaking.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of a fruit infusing water bottle. However, this bottle leaves me wondering where the straw is or where I am supposed to put my mouth when I drink out of the bottle. It definitely infuses the water with fruit like it is supposed to do, I just think the bottle itself needs a little tweaking to make it even better! The best thing about the bottle is that I do not normally drink water and am always dehydrated. Now I will drink more water with the fruit flavor infused into the water!
customer_reviews.author: LESLIEH48307

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to consume more water.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for travel and the fruit/veggie compartment does not allow pieces to float into the water. I have a large plastic straw that I use when I am at home, and another one for the office. I also add ice as I consume the water throughout the day. Perfect way for me to consume more water!
customer_reviews.author: Erin A. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Love My Fruit Infuser Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it daily for about 10 days; absolutely NO PROBLEMS AT ALL. It's the perfect size for me (didn't want anything too big). I fill the tube with my "concoction" of fruit(s), then drop it in the bottle that's filled with water from my Brita Filter pitcher. There is no part of this bottle that has caused me an problem. Love it, LA Organics!!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Infuser Water Bottle I've purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Infuser Water Bottle I've purchased! I've had the glass ones that have broken when accidentally knocked over, I've had the bottle that has a small straw-like opening which to me is harder to drink from. This is perfect and easy to clean. Also, the price is excellent! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen shapona

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: I must've got a bad batch. I ordered 2, one had a hole on the bottom that looked to be a manufacturer defect. The plastic was thin and not filled in completely, hence, the hole. The other was almost the same, except the plastic on the bottom was so thin that it cracked when my niece dropped it just a couple inches off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but one drawback
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my Infuser Water Bottle and the recipe booklet. I am looking forward to trying some of the low-calorie drinks includeed in the recipe booklet. There is one drawback that I found to the bottle. It seals very well, however, the tab that you grasp in order to pull out the infuser tube is very difficult to grasp. I have fingernails, so its difficult and my husband has large hands so it iss equally as difficult for him. There is enough space between the tube and the lid to make that tab sit up a little higher in order to make it easier to grasp.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Avery

customer_reviews.title: Worst design!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design. The inside cap is so tight you cant get it off. No way to get a good grip on it to pull it out. I sent the product back before I could even try it because I couldnt get it apart to even wash it! Also, the drinking spout is odd. No way you are going to be able to tip it very far with out wearing it. Would have given it 0 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Goodrum

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this infuser bottle
customer_reviews.text: I received this infuser bottle a couple of days ago and have used it several times already. I am very happy with it thus far. Nice looking, easy to clean, easy to drink from. I love the time lines. I love the reminder I need to get to drinking. It wouldn't work very well for my husband because he drives for his job and the screw on top would be difficult for him to use. I bought it for me and I knew this when I bought it. Packaging and customer service is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Great little infuser for on the go. Toss in some random fruits and add water then put in the fridge. On your way to work or whatever, grab it and enjoy your flavored water! It works very well, actually. If you use lemons for instance, it only takes maybe an hour in the fridge for the water to be fairly infused and delicious. Other things like frozen berries take a bit longer as they have to thaw.
customer_reviews.author: Terry B.

customer_reviews.title: I like the infuser
customer_reviews.text: I like the infuser, because it is large enough to hold small chunks of fruit, and my water tastes great. I love mixing ginger, pineapple, and mango. The bottle does not sweat, which I adore. However, I deducted a star, because there is no easy way to carry the bottle (handle), and there is no sort of spout for drinking the water. Further, it can be a bit cumbersome to pull out the infuser chamber. If your hands are wet, it is rather slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Student Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I love a hint of citrus in my water, plus want the vitamins and don't drink enough water. Plus am hoping it takes the place of the Ices I drink everyday, there's too much plastic in the world already without my adding 1-2 plastic bottles everyday. The chamber is a nice touch keeping all of the fruit flakes out of my water which I don't like, and it's super easy to clean. A nice purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Love this infuser!
customer_reviews.text: Bottle works great! So easy to take apart and put together. Love that it is dishwasher safe. My 8 year old has been loving taking it to school, & I love that I can see how much water he's actually drinking. Our favorite combos so far have been apple/cinnamon and strawberry/pineapple. 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: AlyciaC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy and excited about this purchase. I am tired of the constant sugary things out there that make me feel sluggish through out the day. Now that I have this water infused water bottle with natural sugars I feel so much better and with energy throughout the day. The product itself is fantastic and easy to use. There is nothing I don't like about this product. It is made well and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Galleos

customer_reviews.title: Water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I like the color of the bottle. I don't like the way that you have to pull the green tab its hard to get it pulled out. Does anyone know how to access the ebook that was the reason that I picked this bottle so how do I get the e-book.
customer_reviews.author: Razberi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I am soooo happy with my bottle! I love love love it! AND I DROPPED IT! It cracked! I immediately contacted the seller since it has a life time warranty and THEY HAVE SENT ME A NEW ONE! AND IT WILL ARRIVE ON SATURDAY! I COULD NOT BE MORE HAPPY! I love the infuser portion! I have used different infuser mixes and i am more than happy! THANKS LA ORGANICS!
customer_reviews.author: Yoli D

customer_reviews.title: The are nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love my infuser water bottle. I brought one for everyday of the week so i can have a different flavors each day. I brought my husband some. I almost didn't give it to him lol. I did. They are nice sturdy bottle. And when im done with these i will buy more. Great 👍
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Rice

customer_reviews.title: Liked it
customer_reviews.text: Really like this infuser. I have had it for a while and use it all the time. The only thing I do not like about it is when you are cleaning it, it can be really hard to get the infuser out of the bottle. Otherwise it works great. Its very durable and its great for all kinds of fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! Put your fruit in overnight and wake up to delicious fruit-infused water!! Great for people who struggle to drink enough water throughout the day, this adds some flavor :)) Try it with citrus fruits like oranges and lemons together, I've done strawberry and cucumbers which is delicious, raspberries, blackberries, and fresh mint!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Shatters easily
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these shatter with very little impact. The first time it was in my bag and I put the bag down with a minor amount of force...it seemed odd that the bottle would shatter, but it still could have been my fault. The second one broke in my hand when I turned around and tapped it lightly on the wall. It shattered too (see the glass like shards in the pic). I liked the design of this bottle a lot (hence why I bought two...I even saved the first bottles filter so I could have two) but the plastic is cheap and not durable. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lainator

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME water bottle
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME water bottle!! This water bottle makes it SOOO much easier for me to get my water in each day! I even bought one for my neighbor. Another great thing about this water bottle is the writing on the side of the water bottle. It has encouraging words for you when drinking your water! HIGHLY recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: cococabana

customer_reviews.title: Add fruit and enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. She uses it all the time to get hydrated. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Great infuser bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle with infuser so far. I've used it for a couple days now and really enjoy the flavoring that comes from the fruit without the chunks/pieces getting in the way. It takes a little getting used to having the green tab/filter top but nothing that would cause me to not use this. I recommend it to anyone looking for an infuser bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Jocey

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact the chamber to hold the fruit is long. I love that there are recipes available online to give you different ideas. And I truly respect the fact that there are followup emails from the company enduring you received what you expected. Made my first bottle last night.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to even remove the green cap that holds the fruit in the in fuser. It was so tight it hurt my hand to try and even my husband couldn't get it open without a pliers. I don't want to cut that hurts to open
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, easy to use, excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, easy to use, excellent price. My college aged son tried my strawberry infused water and immediately asked for his own bottle. Such a refreshing addition to my day.
customer_reviews.author: R & D Long

customer_reviews.title: Bottle Broke...
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my bottle all of 2 feet (from the tips of my fingers to the ground) and the bottom broke out. Had only used for a month and a half...
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Nice bottle right size
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is the perfect size, it fits under the spigot on my water dispensing unit. Many of the other brands are too tall. This bottle is light weight, sturdy and easy to clean. I bought one for myself and a coworker. I will probably buy a few more for inexpensive gifts.
customer_reviews.author: moemiles

customer_reviews.title: I love this water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other infusion water bottles and have always been unhappy with them. That lasted until I tried this infusion water bottle. I love it! It holds a generous amount of water and has a nice sized "infuser" inside. And it fits in all the cars' cup holders I've tried it in. I liked this bottle so much, I bought a few more so that I can put them in the dishwasher and always have an infuser bottle ready when I want one.
customer_reviews.author: Los Gatos Jeweler

customer_reviews.title: Needs to hold more water
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but when you fill it with fruit, it takes up all the space and it would be nice if it held more water.
customer_reviews.author: Golf Nut

customer_reviews.title: Not again!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely not purchase this item again! It’s not what I expected! I am an avid water drinker and change bottles constantly. The chamber is small. There is no proper way to drink from and it arrived cracked! Save your money and purchase else where!!
customer_reviews.author: Chyna

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This infusion bottle is great. Good size, easy to clean and very festive to look at which makes you want to have more water. LAOrganics emailed me a recipe booklet with suggestions for infusions - many of which I would not have considered, and of which look great. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Martha J. Clay

customer_reviews.title: Great item.....
customer_reviews.text: Love this....put fresh blueberries & a few strawberries in it overnight and this morning, had a nice refreshing glass of water. Do wish it was more assessable to take on walks & drink from.....find that a little hard to do, so poured it in a water bottle, which work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jean F.

customer_reviews.title: Fruit Infuser Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these as gifts. The fruit infuser water bottle is great. The e-book (you have to register your bottle to get it) has awesome recipes. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: The person that recommended me to order gave me the wrong description when ...
customer_reviews.text: How about I ordered your fruit infuser by mistake. The person that recommended me to order gave me the wrong description when she emailed it to me and I had already placed my order, but I absolutely love this fruit infuser water bottle. I've never had one before and it's great. I'm going to also order the one that she just gave me the correct information for as well. Thank you so very much. Have a wonderful day.
customer_reviews.author: Carol D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: It infuses water but....
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job beautiful, However my 2 star rating is based more on the cleaning process. The inner container that holds the fruit can be hard to get out. I like to make lemon cucumber mint water and at the end of the day it's very hard to get the fruit out unless you cut it very small. The fruit container is smaller around than a quarter.
customer_reviews.author: faith

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome! I was so excited to get it and ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I was so excited to get it and the FIRST use it got stolen before a spin class at the gym. I received an email asking if I liked the product and prompting a review so on a whim I responded to it thinking it wouldnt even be looked at... within a few mins someone answered and offered to send me a new one! Im super excited to have it back :) Great product and even better customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: A Great Way to Make Water Less Boring!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! A great way to stay hydrated when you’re tired of plain water. Everything is dishwasher safe and the inside cylinder removes for easier cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: D. Slush

customer_reviews.title: My daily accessory
customer_reviews.text: Love this water bottle! It actually helped me to increase my water intake. This is my second purchas of this product only because my first one was filled with ice water and slipped out of my hand and onto the pavement. The bottle survived the hot temps in the dishwasher, being bounced around in a trunk and bookbag...and never a leak. The price is great and i would order this bottle again...obviously since this is the second time i have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great ebook of recipes
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it is so easy to make sure I am drinking water throughout the day with the time measurements down the side of the bottle. As a bonus, you will receive the ebook with 50 Infuser Recipes the same day you order the bottle. I also like that it is dishwasher safe,
customer_reviews.author: Melody D Hermance

customer_reviews.title: Impossibly hard to get the infused tube out.
customer_reviews.text: I love the bottles, but had to use a pair of pliers to get the infused tube unscrewed each time - so that I could fill it. The lids are also screw on/off, so no quick drinking through a pop up straw like option.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie A. Yeates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I gave as a gift for my mom, she likes it a lot. Its cute, does its job, you'll like it a lot! It looked a little small when it got here but its actually a really good size.and you can take off the fruit chamber if you just want a regular bottle. Awesome product, GREAT quality. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: Easy to change out and clean
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it a few days....tried Kiwi left the skin on....not much flavor so will try without the skin to see if is more flavorful. Used strawberries and it worked well. Easy to change out and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First impressions.....
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the infuser water bottle in an attempt to increase my water intake and decrease diet soda consumption. The bottle itself arrived in good shape. The plastic is a little thin on the bottle itself. I can squeeze it and it gives a little, which I don't prefer. But overall, for the price I think it is good enough. Tried blackberries (halved) and didn't get much flavor after infusing overnight. Last night tried strawberries (halved) and mint. This worked great and already drank one bottle. It's back in the fridge now with more water. We'll see how it does on the second go round.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Love the infuser bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love the infuser bottle. Works as described. Only issue I had was that the link for the free electronic set of recipes did NOT work. So 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Look no fuether--this is the obe
customer_reviews.text: I really really like this. It is easy to use and to clean and also easy to carry on the car. The email attachment of recipes is a big bonus.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Wash by hand
customer_reviews.text: Wash by hand on the lid may not fit right after
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is absolutely amazing! I got it for my wife for Mother's Day but I seem to use it equally as much as she does. The infusion Works wonderfully and the added recipes make for a lot of new things for us to try. The customer service end of this product will blow you away! There was never a single moment when I had to wonder what was going on, where my order was or whether it would be up to my standards. I highly recommend this seller and this product. Bottle is heavy duty , durable and easy to use . go get yours today!!
customer_reviews.author: Splitton

customer_reviews.title: this is my first infuser water bottle and I'm very happy I went with this one
customer_reviews.text: Product exactly as pictured, this is my first infuser water bottle and I'm very happy I went with this one. Seller sent e recipe book and was very prompt and courteous. Hopefully now I will be encouraged to drink more water. It even has a daytime measuring guide telling you how much should drink by what time. I recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.author: mkm

customer_reviews.title: Not Insulated
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these - one for my mother and another for myself as a means of encouraging myself to stay better hydrated. While the concept is nice, the bottles are not insulated. As a result, ice melts and the water warms up fairly quickly while sweating all over my desk. Now that I look at the listing again, I see that the product was not advertised as insulated, so this was my mistake. Still, it's a pain to have to return them. I'll just stick with my thermos vacuum insulated water bottle for now.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: My perfect match!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this bottle well packages and everything was as expected, probably a little over my expectations:-) The infusing unit inside is large enough which is rear case with other infusers I have tried. I am also very happy with the packaging and shipping speed. I will be sure to visit again! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Magreth

customer_reviews.title: Its a good item but
customer_reviews.text: Its a good item but!!! Getting the inside container out is very hard . So yes it serves its purpose but be ready to put some finger power into pulling the center out.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice infuser
customer_reviews.text: This is a good infuser, does the job well, does't leak and is a decent size. Looking forward to using it for many years. Contacted the seller about the recipe book and he emailed it as an attachment. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse G

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product to live a healthy lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the product and extremely helpful that it comes with a free ebook with lots of recipes to help you live a healthy life. Love this product and will be buying some for my other family members and will be telling my friends and everyone to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora S.

customer_reviews.title: Fruit Infuser Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bottle to hold your fruit but it is awkward to try to drink out of it. I would have preferred to buy one that you can lift the top to drink out of instead of having to take the top off. Easy to spill the water if you are not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Sport77

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Broke before first use clear infuser part rolled right off the counter as I was cutting fruits to put in it and smashed to bits. Disappointing that I never got to use it and that the durability was non-existent
customer_reviews.author: Mom-of-Seven

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my infuser
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my infuser! I have increased my water intake drastically thanks to my infuser. Easy to use and clean. Would definitely purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Hill

customer_reviews.title: I love the size and easy care of this water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I received this on Sunday and have been using it everyday. I love the size and easy care of this water bottle. I plan to purchase more for gifts because everyone asking about it. I tell them Amazon.com is where I purchase all my items.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a infuser for awhile now and stumbled on this one. It is amazing!!! Works so well and the price is perfect! The best part is they send you a nice typed letter from the owners. That is going above and beyond!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hildebrandt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my mom. She likes adding fruit to her water. And this is a great choice for her. But this would be a great for any person who likes to work out or adding fruit to water. It's a great choice because it's easy to use. It's overall a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Aja Leigh Carletto

customer_reviews.title: ... fruit infuser bottle for about a week & I love it! It doesn't leak
customer_reviews.text: I've used my fruit infuser bottle for about a week & I love it! It doesn't leak. And the fruit stays in the infuser. It's also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Yannaz

customer_reviews.title: Has had fun coming up with different combinations
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my sister and she enjoys it immensely. Has had fun coming up with different combinations. Has not liked all of them, lol, but is enjoying the process.
customer_reviews.author: GEEGEE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bottle! The fruit compartment is perfect keeping the fruits inside. It's 24 oz so you are drinking two glasses. It has a time table print in the bottle so you can keep track on how fast or slow you are drinking, i found this very helpfull, this way i know when to speed up to achieve my goal.
customer_reviews.author: Ayleen Pineda

customer_reviews.title: I love this fruit infuser and everyone at work is complimenting ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had purchased more of these !! This is a must have for any health freak out there! I love this fruit infuser and everyone at work is complimenting my new bottle! I put lemons and mint leaves in mine but I'm definitely going to experiment with more recipes. I only have one negative comment it's that I never received the link for the ebook and I asked for it 3 weeks ago. 🤔 customer service could be better.
customer_reviews.author: L. Karam

customer_reviews.title: Great Experience
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product! I found this at its best price possible & the bottle is great as well for the price. When I purchased I was going to look for my own recipes but I was sent a recipe guide to my email. LA Organics was great with contacting me & letting me know if there were any issues or problems let them know so they can resolve them. Since then I have had multiple family members purchase the same infuser because it works wonders. If your looking for great quality, price, & customer service this is the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser bottle. I works really good and I can now enjoy the benefits of infused water whenever I want. My only problem is that I wish it was easier to take along with me but I just put the water in a different water container
customer_reviews.author: pattie

customer_reviews.title: Lpve it!
customer_reviews.text: ThIs bottle is great! It doesn't leak. I love the way the slots let you drink all the way around the edge, not just in one spot. I am impressed by the customer service as well. I was out for a walk and my bottle fell from my grandson's stroller and cracked. I emailed the company to inquire about getting another one. The response was within a couple hours AND they replaced the bottle. Very impressive and nice to deal with a company who knows the importance of customer service. Thank you LA Organics!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who loves to add various fruits to her water. She loves this item and finds it to be of high quality, easy to clean, and easy to drink from.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Tedford

customer_reviews.title: Five Star
customer_reviews.text: Fruit infuser was jammed into the bottle but a quick pull with pliers popped it out.
customer_reviews.author: K. Backus

customer_reviews.title: Definitely leak proof have been using it for a few ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely leak proof have been using it for a few days now. Only problem is removal of the actual infuser part is a little tough. But not so tough that I wouldn't order again.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great little bottle
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, just the part you take out is hard to remove at times, but I'd recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzica Bibart

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. Only reason i gave it a 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Only reason i gave it a 4 star and not a 5 star is there is no spout on the lid. Its kind of awkward drinking out of it. It doesn't leak, and keeps most of the floaties out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked this product more if it had some kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked this product more if it had some kind of sipper to it. Taking the lid off every time you need a drink is inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How do you get the promised recipe book?
customer_reviews.text: OK, I bought the bottle to gain access to the recipe book but so far no access; what gives?
customer_reviews.author: MLH

customer_reviews.title: Hated drinking water... Until Now!
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought 2 for my wife and I. It was such a hit with her friends at work we ended purchasing an additional 4 bottles and now we're all on the Infused Water trend. I hate drinking water and my wife has tried over the past 12 years to get me to drink two bottles of water daily and nothing worked. I love me some fruits and with some water she finally got me to drink the two bottles of water each day. The quality of the bottle is amazing and it does not spill like traditional bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept!  Love the bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Water is my go-to beverage, and with some pieces of cukes and peppers from my garden, it now has a delicate, FRESH, crisp and satisfying taste! It is in use 24/7--put my veggies in, fill with water each night then into the fridge. I refill the water one more time--and then eat the veggies!. Oh YUM! Works w/ fruit too. Thank you LA Organics!
customer_reviews.author: D. Willcox

customer_reviews.title: Great infuser
customer_reviews.text: My wife really loves this bottle and uses it every day. It is very resistant as well as she has dropped it quite a bit and it is as new. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Rivera Pizzati

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! And I can put a lot of fruit in the fruit holder:) Plus the people of the company have sent me 2 emails just to make sure I liked their product! Way to make an effort :) I will be buying another one
customer_reviews.author: katherine

customer_reviews.title: Not what was expected
customer_reviews.text: The bottle looks great but isn’t easy to drink from. The mouth of the bottle is open on multiple sides.
customer_reviews.author: SueAnnie

customer_reviews.title: Not quite leakproof
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the fruit infusion part works as they say, but I wanted a leak-free bottle that I could confidently carry in my purse and this isn't it. For some reason the main lid will not go on just right to create a leakproof seal. Instead it is just a bit off and dribbles drops out. I'll use it at home, but I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Davida Copperfield

customer_reviews.title: We really enjoyed the bottle at first
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoyed the bottle at first. However, it is difficult to get the inner tube out of the bottle (to replace fruit). The handle that allows you to take out the inner tube is a snap on so if you try to wiggle at all it snaps off. You must pull straight up. After a month, it has become so wedged in the center of the bottle it has become stuck. No way to clean or get inner tube out.
customer_reviews.author: billie

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: I brought this about a week ago. Loved it because it was so easy to use. But unfortunately, I was clumsy and had dropped the water bottle. It’s not durable. Cracked on the bottom. But I emailed company, they responded right away, and took care of it for me. I really appreciated the customer service. Five stars for excellent customer service but durability of this bottle is no bueno after a drop to floor.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Best travel water infuser I have found
customer_reviews.text: This water infuser is great on the go. It fits perfectly in a car beverage holder. It does not leak and is super easy to use and clean. I researched a lot of travel water infusers and this one had the best reviews. I am very happy with it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my botthe, it's wonderful. No complaints about it. As you can see in the picture it has a removable insert for the fruits or herbs to infuse your water. I have to say that I love the shape and size of the bottle. (In the picture my bottle is filled with green apple and cinnamon sticks, it taste very nice!!)
customer_reviews.author: I.M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this fruit infused
customer_reviews.text: Love this fruit infused. Super simple to use, fits in my car's cup holder, making it convenient. The only complaint is that it's hard to remove the cylinder to empty/refill the fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Nash

customer_reviews.title: One of mine came cracked and damaged!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these fruit infuser water containers and one of mine came damaged /: these are comparisons on both of the bottles I ordered. as you can see on the left picture where I circled the damaged area, it looks cracked and disintegrated on the bottom so the water leaks out.. on the other bottle it looks normal. I would like to return in but I think it’s silly going through all that process just for 7 dollars... really disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Ailyn Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a great Infuser Bottle. I sent back that other one wasted my money never got my refund. This bottle is Awsome. Light and you can fit a lot more fruit inside!
customer_reviews.author: tiziana douglas

customer_reviews.title: 100% suggest this product and company :)
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product and awesome customer service when I contacted LA Organics Sean yesterday about losing the lid. He was definitely a great help. And I've already recommended this product to friends and coworkers that liked it. I like reading reviews before purchasing a product on Amazon and everyone seemed to like it on the reviews so I tried it out. I don't regret a thing about buying one😃 great infused bottle. And I use it everyday 😁 oh and easy to clean and fill in water with no hassle. 5 stars for sure
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Execellent bottle , easy to use. Love that it comes with a complete ebook free with a lot of ideas.. thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Everybody at school asked me where did ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Everybody at school asked me where did I get it. I just wish It was bigger so I dont have to refill 4 times in a day but I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs D.

customer_reviews.title: Good bottle, one major flaw
customer_reviews.text: I like this bottle, but I have a lot of trouble getting the green piece out. I usually have to pry it out with a knife. I wish there was an easy way to get it out more carefully but the tab is too small to get a good grip on it.
customer_reviews.author: GTKA

customer_reviews.title: Small Flaw on Arrival, but Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and received it quickly. My only complaint was that the top was warped a tiny bit on one side. It does not seem to take away from the seal, though, so I'll be keeping it and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Meh

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this water bottle! I highly recommend it for anyone who wants healthy water and needs a little extra reminding of staying on track drinking a good amount of water daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Hall

customer_reviews.title: So far, I'm very pleased...
customer_reviews.text: Only been using it for 2 days now, but so far I really like it. It is exactly what I was looking for and is performing well. I received the e-book right away, but have not tried the recipes. My only suggestion would be to upgrade this one by adding the ability to use a straw with the lid on. Other than that, really good product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: SAK

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Worked perfectly as described. I left in the fridge overnight to infuse. Try mango / kiwi for a great combo. It even works with dried fruit or frozen or fresh. I've told all my friends about it too and they want to get one too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drinking more flavorful water today
customer_reviews.text: So far, I really like this bottle. It is easy to fill and clean out also. I did dump it over by accident with the lid on and it did not leak. Nice quality, made in USA product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Moretti

product_meta.title: LA Organics Fruit Infuser Water Bottle 24 oz BPA Free Tritan Leak Proof Sport Water Bottle - FREE Fruit Infusion Recipe Ebook Gift Included
product_meta.description:
Ebook Is Email After The Purchase of the Water Bottle. Best Fruit Infuser Water Bottle - Enjoy the goodness of a healthy, all natural, refreshing taste!

Fruit infusing water bottles are specially designed for infusing fruits with water. An easy and healthy way to increase your water intake. Flavored water bottles encourage you to drink more water. Add your own mind blowing infusions of fresh herbs, seasonal fruits or vegetables and enjoy the best, most refreshing taste!

Calorie free flavor to your dietA detox fruit water bottle that speeds up metabolism, causing the body to burn calories fast. Replace your daily sports or energy drink with infused water, an all natural, calorie and sugar-free drink. Satisfy your sweet tooth cravings and hydrate responsibly!

Features:Leak Proof - BPA Free - Tritan Plastic - Removable Fruit Infuser - Dishwasher Safe - 24 oz.

Easy To Use: Simply chop up some fruits and toss them inside the infusion basket. Shake it and within minutes you have flavored water. Infused fruit water bottles that help you drink more water and stay healthier.

100% CUSTOMER SATISFACTION & LIFE TIME GUARANTEEPurchase our water bottles with infuser with confidence. Your satisfaction is our #1 priority! If you are not fully satisfied, simply reach out to us for an exchange or a hassle-free full refund.
feature_bullets: Detox Water Bottle is BPA Free and Leak Proof. This water infuser can be used for fitness, yoga or at the gym.
Lifetime Guarantee on Your Fruit Infused Water Bottle. Your infuser bottle is 100% protected from leaks.
This fruit infuser water bottle can be used with fruit, tea or vegetables.
Your Fruit Infusion Water Bottle comes with a free infused recipe ebook to make fruit water. The infusion pitcher is extra large to allow the maximum amount of fruit.
